channel.title: Random segfaults when updating a new install
channel.description:
Whonix installed from Whonix-XFCE-16.0.5.3.ova
First run of Whonix Gateway
First system update
`sudo apt update` randomly segfaults

item.title: Random segfaults when updating a new install
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix for VirtualBox?

Probably outdated VirtualBox host software. Probably this, see:
Linux Host Kernel versus Tor Browser and other Crashes

(Whonix is based on Kicksecure.)

Read full topic
item.source: Random segfaults when updating a new install
